Image.title: Image
Image.description: Represents an image with its URL and metadata.

title.description: The title or name of the image.

url.description: The public URL of the image.

section.description: The portfolio section this image belongs to (e.g., 'Post', 'Project').

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the image was added.

/images/{imageId}.description: Stores all image metadata for the portfolio. Publicly readable, admin-writable.
